info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rlan-cfg
info.description:
Model for managing RLAN configuration

       All rights reserved.

**Configuration Module**
**Module:** `Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rlan-cfg`
**Paths:** 15

put.description: Create or replace RLAN profile configurations
